attributes.action: Hands Off Our Overseas Holidays.  Your Taking Our Human Rights Away
attributes.additional_details: Get your acts together Boris Johnson, and Chris Whitty get this mess sorted out and let’s us have our holidays abroad in 2021.  You stopped us having holidays abroad in 2020, locked us all up for Christmas and New Year and first three months of 2021.  This is becoming a joke now.  One whole year of this.  We are all sick of this and the way you are dealing with this whole situation.  Let us go on holiday abroad this year and please listen for once to us working class people of England.  We need to go abroad in 2021.  You are treating us like children the Government keeping us under lock and key for so long.  I thought once had the gay it would be key to our freedom back but how wrong we been believing this.
attributes.background: Don’t stop us going on our holidays abroad this year it was bad enough last year not going.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about restrictions on international travel, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government has published the Global Travel Taskforce's framework for safely reopen international travel, which you can read here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/global-travel-taskforce-sets-out-framework-to-safely-reopen-international-travel

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we could accept a petition calling on the Government to end all restrictions on international travel.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Allow International Travel during lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558124

Permit any international travel for anyone testing negative for Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569621
